name: Check-Mate
description:
This game is about parasites...

The year is 2050. The impact of global warming on the planet has become absurd to deny. The icecaps are melting and revealing their secrets to humanity. 

The best scientists are exploring these icy worlds, searching for new-old organisms and elements. All fossils and microbes found were sent to the leading research laboratory. In the study of the ancient fish's body, found in the icecaps, a fatal mistake was made! 

A tiny piece of scales with a parasite accidentally ended up in the trash can. The Parasite has entered the masses and is about to begin his search for hosts to live, grow and multiply! 

You are the parasite, go out and conquer the world!

The goal was to make an endless chill game that is easy to play. It is mostly meant as an android game, so it may look weird on PC, but we still built it for PC for game jam purposes.
